h2_title: Yellow Wind Ridge Celestial Nonary Pill
content: The Yellow Wind Ridge Celestial Nonary Pill is hidden in a secret area near the First Prince of Flowing Sands. Take out the enemies near the wooden plank opposite the arena and follow the path to a crack in the wall. Squeeze through the crack, take out the Swift Bat, absorb its Spirit, and pass through the door at the end of the room. Head to the back of the rock alcove to find the Celestial Nonary Pill.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Nonary_Pill_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Nonary Pill Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Wind Ridge Celestial Nonary Pill'.
The content is as follows:
The Yellow Wind Ridge Celestial Nonary Pill is hidden in a secret area near the First Prince of Flowing Sands. Take out the enemies near the wooden plank opposite the arena and follow the path to a crack in the wall. Squeeze through the crack, take out the Swift Bat, absorb its Spirit, and pass through the door at the end of the room. Head to the back of the rock alcove to find the Celestial Nonary Pill.
